title: Teacher charged after allegedly feeding puppy to turtle in front of students
content: Robert Crosland is facing one misdemeanor count of animal cruelty. A special prosecutor assigned by Attorney General Lawrence Wasden filed the   Read More Register  Robert Crosland is facing one misdemeanor count of animal cruelty. A special prosecutor assigned by Attorney General Lawrence Wasden filed the charge in Franklin County Court.
